channel.title: wL's 317
channel.description:
[img]http://www.zachera.ws/files/images/jpg/rs1.jpg[/img]
Has anyone heard from wL recently? He said in another post (6+ months ago) that he would be finding his old RS client which takes pictures like the above... although I haven't seen any recent posts by him. I don't mean to be an ass or anything, but that is a really neat client, I wouldn't mind to get a look or two at how it's done. :|
~Z

item.title: wL's 317
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Zachera, post:13, topic:204056”][quote author=unlimitedorb link=topic=269508.msg2218680#msg2218680 date=1210412791]

oww, now that brings up ancient memories sigh
what a coincidence, and yes, I left, but considering the huge amount of time I spent on hacking and messing with that game, I sometimes come back to see what’s currently going and to to wallow in memories It’s sad, but you cannot just wipe out a non-negligible timespan of your life. And I just stumbled about this game in some magazine, so I thought I’d check what’s… Oh yeah and I still have tons of stuff to get rid off, but I never really bothered to sell anything (for real $, I mean), so anybody interested in p-hat sets, armies of autoed chars, a bunch of lvl 120+ ;-p… oh sorry this wasn’t intentent to be a show-off post, but now it is and anyways, it’s typical narcissistic winterlove style (we could call that “winterlovesque”) ;P. So, any offers?
Fine, fine, thou shouldest forgive me, but i am spending to much time on writing this damn article about … err … something weird ok this has gone far too OT.
Anyways someone should do that gfx hack once the new engine is out … hmm, I smell of a challenge…
But I’m kind of surprised, there’s still wL’s shitty crap floating around … btw, does anyone remember this n00b evo ? (I’m allowed to say that due to certain special common grounds)

So yeah, greetings to anyone who might still know me (n00biness factor requires exclusion of evo), notamment semaphore, kait, and all the dewds from original RS (nowadays RSC) times who very very likely are not going to read this nor does anyone else care, so i better save my time posting names
I might be back in the far or near future with more or less interesting ramblings, codes, hacks, cheats, free stuff, winterlovesque posts.

So long

PS: I know, I still have all that code and I would find that digging through my backup disks, unfortunately it has undergone massive transformations and nobody would want to have that, so I won’t bother, but I gave that code already to someone else and jagex wouldn’t like to see that thing posted here either

Comparing all of wL’s previous posts to this one, I find it hard to believe that this is truly winterlove. Maybe you were in a rush or something, but your posts are usually far more structured than this one. This is almost like a random stream of conscience. I’m not saying I know you or anything (just mainly some of your amazing work.), but the writing style seems fishy…

If it really is you, I think it’s wonderful that you checked back in and I apologize for my accusation. It’s amazing that you were able to accomplish what you did so long ago, and people are still trying to mimic what you did. I really do hope to see more from you in the future =-)
[/quote]

/agreed[/quote]Where is ruler when yo… oh:[quote=“ruler, post:14, topic:204056”]Would not surprise me.

I have seen people take past alias and use them.
Big example on these forum is dcthugs.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: wL's 317
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

Greeny:

Just his naming of old names etc, it couldn’t be a newfag. Someone must have done their research if it were a fake

Whaaat? “evo, semaphore, kait, and all the dewds from original RS”
That’s nothing lol.

TBH, in Kaitnieks… I don’t remember wL that much, maybe it’s just my memory going… But all I remember is him posting the original RS2 Private Server code thread and that’s it…

Stop trying to analyze his posts, it’s not like you’re going to find out whether or not it’s him or not.

Read full topic

item.title: wL's 317
item.dc:creator: @semaphore semaphore
item.description:
@semaphore wrote:

Rest assured that the above post was definitely wL. I’ve had many conversations with him and believe it or not, he is a mortal. His typical posts are quite polished… like someone else you know… but that post was raw wL. Besides, he mentioned and hinted about some things that only the real wL would know.

does anyone remember this n00b evo ? (I'm allowed to say that due to certain special common grounds)"
I know evo and I know wL. This is an inside comment between them. Someone outside of us would not know that.
but I gave that code already to someone else and jagex wouldn't like to see that thing posted here either
I know precisely who he is talking about... :D

wL: you’re not the only one to have every word of every post dissected until someone comes to the conclusion that since you didn’t sound like you, you must not be you.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

[quote=“ruler, post:14, topic:204056”]Would not surprise me.

I have seen people take past alias and use them.
Big example on these forum is dcthugs.[/quote]

Yes but this is wL’s original account, so his pass would have had to have been leaked. I can’t see wL being quite that stupid.

Having said that, yes it’s unstructured, but he’s not here to make an impression or make a point. So why would it be…

Just his naming of old names etc, it couldn’t be a newfag. Someone must have done their research if it were a fake

item.description:
@z wrote:

[quote=“unlimitedorb, post:12, topic:204056”][quote author=wL link=topic=269508.msg2218067#msg2218067 date=1210380951]
oww, now that brings up ancient memories sigh
what a coincidence, and yes, I left, but considering the huge amount of time I spent on hacking and messing with that game, I sometimes come back to see what’s currently going and to to wallow in memories It’s sad, but you cannot just wipe out a non-negligible timespan of your life. And I just stumbled about this game in some magazine, so I thought I’d check what’s… Oh yeah and I still have tons of stuff to get rid off, but I never really bothered to sell anything (for real $, I mean), so anybody interested in p-hat sets, armies of autoed chars, a bunch of lvl 120+ ;-p… oh sorry this wasn’t intentent to be a show-off post, but now it is and anyways, it’s typical narcissistic winterlove style (we could call that “winterlovesque”) ;P. So, any offers?
Fine, fine, thou shouldest forgive me, but i am spending to much time on writing this damn article about … err … something weird ok this has gone far too OT.
Anyways someone should do that gfx hack once the new engine is out … hmm, I smell of a challenge…
But I’m kind of surprised, there’s still wL’s shitty crap floating around … btw, does anyone remember this n00b evo ? (I’m allowed to say that due to certain special common grounds)

So yeah, greetings to anyone who might still know me (n00biness factor requires exclusion of evo), notamment semaphore, kait, and all the dewds from original RS (nowadays RSC) times who very very likely are not going to read this nor does anyone else care, so i better save my time posting names
I might be back in the far or near future with more or less interesting ramblings, codes, hacks, cheats, free stuff, winterlovesque posts.

So long

PS: I know, I still have all that code and I would find that digging through my backup disks, unfortunately it has undergone massive transformations and nobody would want to have that, so I won’t bother, but I gave that code already to someone else and jagex wouldn’t like to see that thing posted here either

[/quote]

Comparing all of wL’s previous posts to this one, I find it hard to believe that this is truly winterlove. Maybe you were in a rush or something, but your posts are usually far more structured than this one. This is almost like a random stream of conscience. I’m not saying I know you or anything (just mainly some of your amazing work.), but the writing style seems fishy…

If it really is you, I think it’s wonderful that you checked back in and I apologize for my accusation. It’s amazing that you were able to accomplish what you did so long ago, and people are still trying to mimic what you did. I really do hope to see more from you in the future =-)[/quote]

/agreed

So, any offers?
Fine, fine, thou shouldest forgive me, but i am spending to much time on writing this damn article about … err … something weird ok this has gone far too OT.
Anyways someone should do that gfx hack once the new engine is out … hmm, I smell of a challenge…
But I’m kind of surprised, there’s still wL’s shitty crap floating around … btw, does anyone remember this n00b evo ? (I’m allowed to say that due to certain special common grounds)

So yeah, greetings to anyone who might still know me (n00biness factor requires exclusion of evo), notamment semaphore, kait, and all the dewds from original RS (nowadays RSC) times who very very likely are not going to read this nor does anyone else care, so i better save my time posting names

I’m not saying I know you or anything (just mainly some of your amazing work.), but the writing style seems fishy…

item.title: wL's 317
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

evo is long gone, along with a few other people you mentioned. Semaphore stops by on occasions though.

Also, about your “shitty crap” floating round, the entire moparscape epidemic is based from your source, I imagine you already know that, but just too warn you, don’t go looking into any of it, the shame would be to much and you might just /quit life at the bullshit they have produced from it. Your server emulator is what just about every “major” project on that site is based off of.

Anyway, nice to see you back on what I imagine is a 1 off post although it would be nice to see you back more often, you’d be surprised how many old schoolers are still about (although the majority are in IRC (although not really, really old more Kaitnieks days as opposed to further back). Feel free to join the IRC for a chat though ofcourse.)

EDIT: Coincidentally, i said this on IRC last night, I just find it really ironic.

0014(1520:13:4014) 4(Greeny4) if wL returned for like a day
0014(1520:13:4514) 4(Greeny4) would he /wrists
0014(1520:13:4914) 4(Greeny4) once he saw moparscape

Sorry for the crappy timestamps and formatting in my logs ;D

Read full topic

item.title: wL's 317
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

vbcoderx:

i can’t help you find the wL client, but this is achieved by modifying the camera field values…

Plus removing “tile clipping” or “fog of war” so that you can see multiple regions.
